text: DWCM, under the brand 99.5 Love Radio Legazpi, is a music FM radio station of the Manila Broadcasting Company operating in Legazpi. Its studio and transmitter is located at the 3rd Floor Morante Bldg., Imperial Court Subd. Ph.2, Rizal St., Legazpi City. It operates daily from 4:00 AM to 10:00 PM.2015 ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REPORT | NTC Region 5 ==Disc Jockey's== * Tommy Tambay * Sexy Terry * Papa Jack * Rey Porter ==Nationwide programming== *Tambalan with Chris Tsuper and Nicole Hyala (Monday-Friday 8am-9:30am) ==References== Category:Adult hits radio stations in the Philippines Category:Radio stations in Legazpi, Albay Category:Radio stations established in 1989 Category:Love Radio Network stations
title: DWCM-FM
